title: Reduced Inequalities
description: Advance equal opportunities and social protection, in ways that focus on reducing the impediments faced by persons living with disabilities.

title: Zero Hunger
description: Improve the food security of vulnerable households and make nutrition support accessible for persons with economically disadvantaged people.

title: Responsible Consumption and Production
description: Support environmental responsibility through recycling, waste reduction, and community sensitization projects.

title: Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure
description: Support simple, accessible innovation and community infrastructure that are conducive to all-inclusive development.

title: Quality Education
description: Support education for inclusive learning through educational materials, literacy programmes, teachers training, and 21st century education.

title: Good Health and Well-Being
description: Provide accessible healthcare outreach, health education and community medical services.

title: Decent Work and Economic Growth
description: Provide skills training, livelihood support, and economic inclusion initiatives that prioritize persons with disabilities and low-income groups.

title: Partnerships for the Goals
description: Build strong collaborations with government agencies, NGOs, disability organizations, and international partners to expand impact.

title: Climate Action
description: Advance climate education and community resilience, guaranteeing participation and protection for people in environmental efforts.

title: Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions
description: Encourage peaceful coexistence, community mediation, and accountable systems that protect the rights of all.
